changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), SOURCE_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, SOURCE_TYPE NVARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, CSV_ERROR BIT NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, EXCEPTION_TIME DATETIMEOFFSET NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_EXCEPTION_TIME DEFAULT GETUTCDATE() INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_EXCEPTION_TIME, TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL INDEX IX_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID, CONSTRAINT PK_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ID]), CONSTRAINT FK_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_TIMESERIES_HEADER FOREIGN KEY (TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID) REFERENCES ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_HEADER ([ID]), CONSTRAINT CHK_TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION_SOURCE_TYPE CHECK (SOURCE_TYPE IN ('F', 'P')) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE ${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES_STAGING_EXCEPTION
